Articles.Content:
Hi,

I joined because I am interested in meeting developers/modders for KSP. I'm also interested in developing minimally intrusive, practical mods for KSP. I have absolutely zero KSP modding experience and I'm hoping to learn.

Hello Floofies, and welcome to our forum. The developers are mostly down there in Mexico City, but modders are thicker than ticks on a dog around these parts, so you should be meeting plenty of them soon.

The simplest mods are modulemanager config file mods.

Examples of what you can do with these is create a 2.5m version and a 0.625m version of a 1.25m part. You of course need to learn how to calculate out appropraitely balanced values for everything, but it works pretty well.

Huh. In the FAQ the signature size limit says "no taller than 80 pixels, text and images included, no greater than 750 pixels wide" .. but the forum software says "The maximum size of your custom image is 750 by 120 pixels".

Edited August 14, 2014 by Floofies
